oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Toys
Felix the Cat (Fictitious character)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wallace and Frances Robinson, children of Frank Robinson, in the window of their playhouse. The boy has a Felix the cat toy and the girl is holding a monkey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: TSLA Staff
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
